heroHeader.title: Instafel Updater
heroHeader.subtitle: Mises à jour automatiques, sans efforts
heroHeader.description: Gardez Instafel à jour avec ce compagnon qui gèrera les mises à jour seul avec Shizuku ou Root.

install.title: Installer et donner les permissions
install.description: Installez l'application et donnez la permission pour Shizuku ou pour le Root.

configure.title: Configurer
configure.description: Choose your update preferences and check frequency.

automatic.title: Mises à jour automatiques
automatic.description: Relax and let Updater handle everything for you.

silent.title: Silent Installation
silent.description: Runs in the background to automatically download and install the latest versions from our API.

shizuku.title: Shizuku Support
shizuku.description: Works on non-rooted phones with Shizuku without requiring any additional root managers.

openSource.title: Open Source
openSource.description: Completely transparent code so you can trust the app with the necessary permissions.

benefits.latestFeatures: Always have the latest patches and features automatically
benefits.saveTime: Save time with background updates instead of manual OTA checks
benefits.lightweight: Lightweight and efficient with minimal resource usage
benefits.notifications: Get notified only when updates are successfully installed
benefits.compatibility: Works seamlessly with both Shizuku and Root methods

callToAction.title: Get it now!
callToAction.description: Keep your Instafel experience up-to-date with minimum effort. Download the updater now.
